testcase.name: Derived string types xs:ID [Result] must represent it by "xs:ID('foo')" (XSLT) or "'foo'" (XQuery)
Derived string types xs:IDREF [Result] must represent it by "xs:IDREF('foo')" (XSLT) or "'foo'" (XQuery)
Derived string types xs:ENTITY [Result] must represent it by "xs:ENTITY('foo')" (XSLT) or "'foo'" (XQuery)
Derived string types xs:NCName [Result] must represent it by "xs:NCName('foo')" (XSLT) or "'foo'" (XQuery)
Derived string types xs:language [Result] must represent it by "xs:language('en')" (XSLT) or "'en'" (XQuery)
Derived string types xs:Name [Result] must represent it by "xs:Name('foo')" (XSLT) or "'foo'" (XQuery)
Derived string types xs:NMTOKEN [Result] must represent it by "xs:NMTOKEN('foo')" (XSLT) or "'foo'" (XQuery)
Derived string types xs:token [Result] must represent it by "xs:token('foo')" (XSLT) or "'foo'" (XQuery)
Derived string types xs:normalizedString [Result] must represent it by "xs:normalizedString('foo')" (XSLT) or "'foo'" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:negativeInteger [Result] must represent it by "xs:negativeInteger(-1)" (XSLT) or "-1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:nonPositiveInteger [Result] must represent it by "xs:nonPositiveInteger(0)" (XSLT) or "0" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:byte [Result] must represent it by "xs:byte(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:short [Result] must represent it by "xs:short(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:int [Result] must represent it by "xs:int(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:long [Result] must represent it by "xs:long(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:unsignedByte [Result] must represent it by "xs:unsignedByte(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:unsignedShort [Result] must represent it by "xs:unsignedShort(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:unsignedInt [Result] must represent it by "xs:unsignedInt(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:unsignedLong [Result] must represent it by "xs:unsignedLong(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:positiveInteger [Result] must represent it by "xs:positiveInteger(1)" (XSLT) or "1" (XQuery)
Derived numeric types xs:nonNegativeInteger [Result] must represent it by "xs:nonNegativeInteger(0)" (XSLT) or "0" (XQuery)
